TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Ludja, title = Ludja, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ludja} }

S.FORM: Ludja Itiniay i Taiwu Cen no Pingtung ko Ludja a niyaro', 42 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 184 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 175 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 9 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan93 , Amis1 , Bunun1 .
